Horizontal padding
Internal horizontal padding can be turned on or off to create
visual separation between the contents of each cell. Default
Body label padding is 24px but it can be customised depending on content
density.

Columns can have custom or equal widths
Columns should have equal widths when they are expected to render content of similar
lengths, but can be adjusted to suit different proportions if the content length will vary
dramatically among the columns.
Product Width (cm Depth (cm Height (cm Seat width (cm

ext 16 8 6 221
ext 16 9 7 22
ext 21 9 7 19
ext 16 9 6 19
ext 21 9 6 201

Columns with custom widths.
Cells support a variety of content types
The Table component can be edited to support a variety of content types like images,
icons and different text styles.
Manual support Service support File size
2 IKEA Encyclopedia No 8 MB
2 IKEA Catalog No 2 MB
(2? HEMNES Assembly Instructions Yes 2 MB
2 Chair Assembly Instructions Yes 5.5 MB
2 Desk Assembly Instructions Phone call 4 MB
Cells displaying icons and linked text.
Left-aligned text and right-aligned numbers
Left-aligned cells are typically used with text content, while numerical content is
typically right aligned to help users compare decimal units. To maintain consistency,
align the headers to the same side as the cell contents of their columns.
We use monospace numbers, also known as tabular figures, to improve the scanning
ability of figures in a Table.
Sofa Style Color Sofa Price (£) Year
BRATHULT Corner Borred Grey BRATHULT 675 2020
BRATHULT U-Shaped Vissle Red EKTORP 554 2018
VIMLE Corner Tobeto Beige NOCKEBY 680 2020
VIMLE Corner Hallarp Grey SANDBACKEN 600 2019
VIMLE U-Shaped Hallarp Grey VIMLE 826 2020
Text content aligned to the left. Numerical content is monospaced and aligned to the right, with alignment of column
headers matching the cell content.
Internationalisation
